068/**
069 * Manager that handles {@link Plot} modifications
070 */
071public final class PlotModificationManager {
072
073    private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger("PlotSquared/" + PlotModificationManager.class.getSimpleName());
074
075    private final Plot plot;
076    private final ProgressSubscriberFactory subscriberFactory;
077
078    @Inject
079    PlotModificationManager(final @NonNull Plot plot) {
080        this.plot = plot;
081        this.subscriberFactory = PlotSquared.platform().injector().getInstance(ProgressSubscriberFactory.class);
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Copy a plot to a location, both physically and the settings
086     *
087     * @param destination destination plot
088     * @param actor       the actor associated with the copy
089     * @return Future that completes with {@code true} if the copy was successful, else {@code false}
090     */
091    public CompletableFuture<Boolean> copy(final @NonNull Plot destination, @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor) {
092        final CompletableFuture<Boolean> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
093        final PlotId offset = PlotId.of(
094                destination.getId().getX() - this.plot.getId().getX(),
095                destination.getId().getY() - this.plot.getId().getY()
096        );
097        final Location db = destination.getBottomAbs();
098        final Location ob = this.plot.getBottomAbs();
099        final int offsetX = db.getX() - ob.getX();
100        final int offsetZ = db.getZ() - ob.getZ();
101        if (!this.plot.hasOwner()) {
102            TaskManager.runTaskLater(() -> future.complete(false), TaskTime.ticks(1L));
103            return future;
104        }
105        final Set<Plot> plots = this.plot.getConnectedPlots();
106        for (final Plot plot : plots) {
107            final Plot other = plot.getRelative(destination.getArea(), offset.getX(), offset.getY());
108            if (other.hasOwner()) {
109                TaskManager.runTaskLater(() -> future.complete(false), TaskTime.ticks(1L));
110                return future;
111            }
112        }
113        // world border
114        destination.updateWorldBorder();
115        // copy data
116        for (final Plot plot : plots) {
117            final Plot other = plot.getRelative(destination.getArea(), offset.getX(), offset.getY());
118            other.getPlotModificationManager().create(plot.getOwner(), false);
119            if (!plot.getFlagContainer().getFlagMap().isEmpty()) {
120                final Collection<PlotFlag<?, ?>> existingFlags = other.getFlags();
121                other.getFlagContainer().clearLocal();
122                other.getFlagContainer().addAll(plot.getFlagContainer().getFlagMap().values());
123                // Update the database
124                for (final PlotFlag<?, ?> flag : existingFlags) {
125                    final PlotFlag<?, ?> newFlag = other.getFlagContainer().queryLocal(flag.getClass());
126                    if (other.getFlagContainer().queryLocal(flag.getClass()) == null) {
127                        DBFunc.removeFlag(other, flag);
128                    } else {
129                        DBFunc.setFlag(other, newFlag);
130                    }
131                }
132            }
133            if (plot.isMerged()) {
134                other.setMerged(plot.getMerged());
135            }
136            if (plot.members != null && !plot.members.isEmpty()) {
137                other.members = plot.members;
138                for (UUID member : plot.members) {
139                    DBFunc.setMember(other, member);
140                }
141            }
142            if (plot.trusted != null && !plot.trusted.isEmpty()) {
143                other.trusted = plot.trusted;
144                for (UUID trusted : plot.trusted) {
145                    DBFunc.setTrusted(other, trusted);
146                }
147            }
148            if (plot.denied != null && !plot.denied.isEmpty()) {
149                other.denied = plot.denied;
150                for (UUID denied : plot.denied) {
151                    DBFunc.setDenied(other, denied);
152                }
153            }
154        }
155        // copy terrain
156        final ArrayDeque<CuboidRegion> regions = new ArrayDeque<>(this.plot.getRegions());
157        final Runnable run = new Runnable() {
158            @Override
159            public void run() {
160                if (regions.isEmpty()) {
161                    final QueueCoordinator queue = plot.getArea().getQueue();
162                    for (final Plot current : plot.getConnectedPlots()) {
163                        destination.getManager().claimPlot(current, queue);
164                    }
165                    if (queue.size() > 0) {
166                        queue.enqueue();
167                    }
168                    destination.getPlotModificationManager().setSign();
169                    future.complete(true);
170                    return;
171                }
172                CuboidRegion region = regions.poll();
173                Location[] corners = Plot.getCorners(plot.getWorldName(), region);
174                Location pos1 = corners[0];
175                Location pos2 = corners[1];
176                Location newPos = pos1.add(offsetX, 0, offsetZ).withWorld(destination.getWorldName());
177                PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().copyRegion(pos1, pos2, newPos, actor, this);
178            }
179        };
180        run.run();
181        return future;
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * Clear the plot
186     *
187     * <p>
188     * Use {@link #deletePlot(PlotPlayer, Runnable)} to clear and delete a plot
189     * </p>
190     *
191     * @param whenDone A runnable to execute when clearing finishes, or null
192     * @see #clear(boolean, boolean, PlotPlayer, Runnable)
193     */
194    public void clear(final @Nullable Runnable whenDone) {
195        this.clear(false, false, null, whenDone);
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * Clear the plot
200     *
201     * <p>
202     * Use {@link #deletePlot(PlotPlayer, Runnable)} to clear and delete a plot
203     * </p>
204     *
205     * @param checkRunning Whether or not already executing tasks should be checked
206     * @param isDelete     Whether or not the plot is being deleted
207     * @param actor        The actor clearing the plot
208     * @param whenDone     A runnable to execute when clearing finishes, or null
209     */
210    public boolean clear(
211            final boolean checkRunning,
212            final boolean isDelete,
213            final @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
214            final @Nullable Runnable whenDone
215    ) {
216        if (checkRunning && this.plot.getRunning() != 0) {
217            return false;
218        }
219        final Set<CuboidRegion> regions = this.plot.getRegions();
220        final Set<Plot> plots = this.plot.getConnectedPlots();
221        final ArrayDeque<Plot> queue = new ArrayDeque<>(plots);
222        if (isDelete) {
223            this.removeSign();
224        }
225        PlotUnlinkEvent event = PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher()
226                .callUnlink(
227                        this.plot.getArea(),
228                        this.plot,
229                        true,
230                        !isDelete,
231                        isDelete ? PlotUnlinkEvent.REASON.DELETE : PlotUnlinkEvent.REASON.CLEAR
232                );
233        if (event.getEventResult() != Result.DENY && this.unlinkPlot(event.isCreateRoad(), event.isCreateSign())) {
234            PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher().callPostUnlink(plot, event.getReason());
235        }
236        final PlotManager manager = this.plot.getArea().getPlotManager();
237        Runnable run = new Runnable() {
238            @Override
239            public void run() {
240                if (queue.isEmpty()) {
241                    Runnable run = () -> {
242                        for (CuboidRegion region : regions) {
243                            Location[] corners = Plot.getCorners(plot.getWorldName(), region);
244                            PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().clearAllEntities(corners[0], corners[1]);
245                        }
246                        TaskManager.runTask(whenDone);
247                    };
248                    QueueCoordinator queue = plot.getArea().getQueue();
249                    for (Plot current : plots) {
250                        if (isDelete || !current.hasOwner()) {
251                            manager.unClaimPlot(current, null, queue);
252                        } else {
253                            manager.claimPlot(current, queue);
254                            if (plot.getArea() instanceof ClassicPlotWorld cpw) {
255                                manager.setComponent(current.getId(), "wall", cpw.WALL_FILLING.toPattern(), actor, queue);
256                            }
257                        }
258                    }
259                    if (queue.size() > 0) {
260                        queue.setCompleteTask(run);
261                        queue.enqueue();
262                        return;
263                    }
264                    run.run();
265                    return;
266                }
267                Plot current = queue.poll();
268                current.clearCache();
269                if (plot.getArea().getTerrain() != PlotAreaTerrainType.NONE) {
270                    try {
271                        PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().regenerateRegion(
272                                current.getBottomAbs(),
273                                current.getTopAbs(),
274                                false,
275                                this
276                        );
277                    } catch (UnsupportedOperationException exception) {
278                        exception.printStackTrace();
279                        return;
280                    }
281                    return;
282                }
283                manager.clearPlot(current, this, actor, null);
284            }
285        };
286        run.run();
287        return true;
288    }
289
290    /**
291     * Sets the biome for a plot asynchronously.
292     *
293     * @param biome    The biome e.g. "forest"
294     * @param whenDone The task to run when finished, or null
295     */
296    public void setBiome(final @Nullable BiomeType biome, final @NonNull Runnable whenDone) {
297        final ArrayDeque<CuboidRegion> regions = new ArrayDeque<>(this.plot.getRegions());
298        final int extendBiome;
299        if (this.plot.getArea() instanceof SquarePlotWorld) {
300            extendBiome = (((SquarePlotWorld) this.plot.getArea()).ROAD_WIDTH > 0) ? 1 : 0;
301        } else {
302            extendBiome = 0;
303        }
304        Runnable run = new Runnable() {
305            @Override
306            public void run() {
307                if (regions.isEmpty()) {
308                    TaskManager.runTask(whenDone);
309                    return;
310                }
311                CuboidRegion region = regions.poll();
312                PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().setBiome(region, extendBiome, biome, plot.getArea(), this);
313            }
314        };
315        run.run();
316    }
317
318    /**
319     * Unlink the plot and all connected plots.
320     *
321     * @param createRoad whether to recreate road
322     * @param createSign whether to recreate signs
323     * @return success/!cancelled
324     */
325    public boolean unlinkPlot(final boolean createRoad, final boolean createSign) {
326        if (!this.plot.isMerged()) {
327            return false;
328        }
329        final Set<Plot> plots = this.plot.getConnectedPlots();
330        ArrayList<PlotId> ids = new ArrayList<>(plots.size());
331        for (Plot current : plots) {
332            current.setHome(null);
333            current.clearCache();
334            ids.add(current.getId());
335        }
336        this.plot.clearRatings();
337        QueueCoordinator queue = this.plot.getArea().getQueue();
338        if (createSign) {
339            this.removeSign();
340        }
341        PlotManager manager = this.plot.getArea().getPlotManager();
342        if (createRoad) {
343            manager.startPlotUnlink(ids, queue);
344        }
345        if (this.plot.getArea().getTerrain() != PlotAreaTerrainType.ALL && createRoad) {
346            for (Plot current : plots) {
347                if (current.isMerged(Direction.EAST)) {
348                    manager.createRoadEast(current, queue);
349                    if (current.isMerged(Direction.SOUTH)) {
350                        manager.createRoadSouth(current, queue);
351                        if (current.isMerged(Direction.SOUTHEAST)) {
352                            manager.createRoadSouthEast(current, queue);
353                        }
354                    }
355                }
356                if (current.isMerged(Direction.SOUTH)) {
357                    manager.createRoadSouth(current, queue);
358                }
359            }
360        }
361        for (Plot current : plots) {
362            boolean[] merged = new boolean[]{false, false, false, false};
363            current.setMerged(merged);
364        }
365        if (createSign) {
366            queue.setCompleteTask(() -> TaskManager.runTaskAsync(() -> {
367                for (Plot current : plots) {
368                    current.getPlotModificationManager().setSign(PlayerManager.resolveName(current.getOwnerAbs()).getComponent(
369                            LocaleHolder.console()));
370                }
371            }));
372        }
373        if (createRoad) {
374            manager.finishPlotUnlink(ids, queue);
375        }
376        if (queue != null) {
377            queue.enqueue();
378        }
379        return true;
380    }
381
382    /**
383     * Sets the sign for a plot to a specific name
384     *
385     * @param name name
386     */
387    public void setSign(final @NonNull String name) {
388        if (!this.plot.isLoaded()) {
389            return;
390        }
391        PlotManager manager = this.plot.getArea().getPlotManager();
392        if (this.plot.getArea().allowSigns()) {
393            Location location = manager.getSignLoc(this.plot);
394            String id = this.plot.getId().toString();
395            Caption[] lines = new Caption[]{TranslatableCaption.of("signs.owner_sign_line_1"), TranslatableCaption.of(
396                    "signs.owner_sign_line_2"),
397                    TranslatableCaption.of("signs.owner_sign_line_3"), TranslatableCaption.of("signs.owner_sign_line_4")};
398            PlotSquared.platform().worldUtil().setSign(location, lines, TagResolver.builder()
399                    .tag("id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(id)))
400                    .tag("owner", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
401                    .build());
402        }
403    }
404
405    /**
406     * Resend all chunks inside the plot to nearby players<br>
407     * This should not need to be called
408     */
409    public void refreshChunks() {
410        final HashSet<BlockVector2> chunks = new HashSet<>();
411        for (final CuboidRegion region : this.plot.getRegions()) {
412            for (int x = region.getMinimumPoint().getX() >> 4; x <= region.getMaximumPoint().getX() >> 4; x++) {
413                for (int z = region.getMinimumPoint().getZ() >> 4; z <= region.getMaximumPoint().getZ() >> 4; z++) {
414                    if (chunks.add(BlockVector2.at(x, z))) {
415                        PlotSquared.platform().worldUtil().refreshChunk(x, z, this.plot.getWorldName());
416                    }
417                }
418            }
419        }
420    }
421
422    /**
423     * Remove the plot sign if it is set.
424     */
425    public void removeSign() {
426        PlotManager manager = this.plot.getArea().getPlotManager();
427        if (!this.plot.getArea().allowSigns()) {
428            return;
429        }
430        Location location = manager.getSignLoc(this.plot);
431        QueueCoordinator queue =
432                PlotSquared.platform().globalBlockQueue().getNewQueue(PlotSquared
433                        .platform()
434                        .worldUtil()
435                        .getWeWorld(this.plot.getWorldName()));
436        queue.setBlock(location.getX(), location.getY(), location.getZ(), BlockTypes.AIR.getDefaultState());
437        queue.enqueue();
438    }
439
440    /**
441     * Sets the plot sign if plot signs are enabled.
442     */
443    public void setSign() {
444        if (!this.plot.hasOwner()) {
445            this.setSign("unknown");
446            return;
447        }
448        PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline().getSingle(
449                this.plot.getOwnerAbs(),
450                (username, sign) -> this.setSign(username)
451        );
452    }
453
454    /**
455     * Register a plot and create it in the database<br>
456     * - The plot will not be created if the owner is null<br>
457     * - Any setting from before plot creation will not be saved until the server is stopped properly. i.e. Set any values/options after plot
458     * creation.
459     *
460     * @return {@code true} if plot was created successfully
461     */
462    public boolean create() {
463        return this.create(this.plot.getOwnerAbs(), true);
464    }
465
466    /**
467     * Register a plot and create it in the database<br>
468     * - The plot will not be created if the owner is null<br>
469     * - Any setting from before plot creation will not be saved until the server is stopped properly. i.e. Set any values/options after plot
470     * creation.
471     *
472     * @param uuid   the uuid of the plot owner
473     * @param notify notify
474     * @return {@code true} if plot was created successfully, else {@code false}
475     */
476    public boolean create(final @NonNull UUID uuid, final boolean notify) {
477        this.plot.setOwnerAbs(uuid);
478        Plot existing = this.plot.getArea().getOwnedPlotAbs(this.plot.getId());
479        if (existing != null) {
480            throw new IllegalStateException("Plot already exists!");
481        }
482        if (notify) {
483            Integer meta = (Integer) this.plot.getArea().getMeta("worldBorder");
484            if (meta != null) {
485                this.plot.updateWorldBorder();
486            }
487        }
488        this.plot.clearCache();
489        this.plot.getTrusted().clear();
490        this.plot.getMembers().clear();
491        this.plot.getDenied().clear();
492        this.plot.settings = new PlotSettings();
493        if (this.plot.getArea().addPlot(this.plot)) {
494            DBFunc.createPlotAndSettings(this.plot, () -> {
495                PlotArea plotworld = plot.getArea();
496                if (notify && plotworld.isAutoMerge()) {
497                    final PlotPlayer<?> player = PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(uuid);
498
499                    PlotMergeEvent event = PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher().callMerge(
500                            this.plot,
501                            Direction.ALL,
502                            Integer.MAX_VALUE,
503                            player
504                    );
505
506                    if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
507                        if (player != null) {
508                            player.sendMessage(
509                                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
510                                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Auto merge on claim")))
511                            );
512                        }
513                        return;
514                    }
515                    if (plot.getPlotModificationManager().autoMerge(event.getDir(), event.getMax(), uuid, player, true)) {
516                        PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher().callPostMerge(player, plot);
517                    }
518                }
519            });
520            return true;
521        }
522        LOGGER.info(
523                "Failed to add plot {} to plot area {}",
524                this.plot.getId().toCommaSeparatedString(),
525                this.plot.getArea().toString()
526        );
527        return false;
528    }
529
530    /**
531     * Auto merge a plot in a specific direction.
532     *
533     * @param dir         the direction to merge
534     * @param max         the max number of merges to do
535     * @param uuid        the UUID it is allowed to merge with
536     * @param actor       The actor executing the task
537     * @param removeRoads whether to remove roads
538     * @return {@code true} if a merge takes place, else {@code false}
539     */
540    public boolean autoMerge(
541            final @NonNull Direction dir,
542            int max,
543            final @NonNull UUID uuid,
544            @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
545            final boolean removeRoads
546    ) {
547        //Ignore merging if there is no owner for the plot
548        if (!this.plot.hasOwner()) {
549            return false;
550        }
551        Set<Plot> connected = this.plot.getConnectedPlots();
552        HashSet<PlotId> merged = connected.stream().map(Plot::getId).collect(Collectors.toCollection(HashSet::new));
553        ArrayDeque<Plot> frontier = new ArrayDeque<>(connected);
554        Plot current;
555        boolean toReturn = false;
556        HashSet<Plot> visited = new HashSet<>();
557        QueueCoordinator queue = this.plot.getArea().getQueue();
558        while ((current = frontier.poll()) != null && max >= 0) {
559            if (visited.contains(current)) {
560                continue;
561            }
562            visited.add(current);
563            Set<Plot> plots;
564            if ((dir == Direction.ALL || dir == Direction.NORTH) && !current.isMerged(Direction.NORTH)) {
565                Plot other = current.getRelative(Direction.NORTH);
566                if (other != null && other.isOwner(uuid) && (other.getBasePlot(false).equals(current.getBasePlot(false))
567                        || (plots = other.getConnectedPlots()).size() <= max && frontier.addAll(plots) && (max -= plots.size()) != -1)) {
568                    current.mergePlot(other, removeRoads, queue);
569                    merged.add(current.getId());
570                    merged.add(other.getId());
571                    toReturn = true;
572
573                    if (removeRoads) {
574                        ArrayList<PlotId> ids = new ArrayList<>();
575                        ids.add(current.getId());
576                        ids.add(other.getId());
577                        this.plot.getManager().finishPlotMerge(ids, queue);
578                    }
579                }
580            }
581            if (max >= 0 && (dir == Direction.ALL || dir == Direction.EAST) && !current.isMerged(Direction.EAST)) {
582                Plot other = current.getRelative(Direction.EAST);
583                if (other != null && other.isOwner(uuid) && (other.getBasePlot(false).equals(current.getBasePlot(false))
584                        || (plots = other.getConnectedPlots()).size() <= max && frontier.addAll(plots) && (max -= plots.size()) != -1)) {
585                    current.mergePlot(other, removeRoads, queue);
586                    merged.add(current.getId());
587                    merged.add(other.getId());
588                    toReturn = true;
589
590                    if (removeRoads) {
591                        ArrayList<PlotId> ids = new ArrayList<>();
592                        ids.add(current.getId());
593                        ids.add(other.getId());
594                        this.plot.getManager().finishPlotMerge(ids, queue);
595                    }
596                }
597            }
598            if (max >= 0 && (dir == Direction.ALL || dir == Direction.SOUTH) && !current.isMerged(Direction.SOUTH)) {
599                Plot other = current.getRelative(Direction.SOUTH);
600                if (other != null && other.isOwner(uuid) && (other.getBasePlot(false).equals(current.getBasePlot(false))
601                        || (plots = other.getConnectedPlots()).size() <= max && frontier.addAll(plots) && (max -= plots.size()) != -1)) {
602                    current.mergePlot(other, removeRoads, queue);
603                    merged.add(current.getId());
604                    merged.add(other.getId());
605                    toReturn = true;
606
607                    if (removeRoads) {
608                        ArrayList<PlotId> ids = new ArrayList<>();
609                        ids.add(current.getId());
610                        ids.add(other.getId());
611                        this.plot.getManager().finishPlotMerge(ids, queue);
612                    }
613                }
614            }
615            if (max >= 0 && (dir == Direction.ALL || dir == Direction.WEST) && !current.isMerged(Direction.WEST)) {
616                Plot other = current.getRelative(Direction.WEST);
617                if (other != null && other.isOwner(uuid) && (other.getBasePlot(false).equals(current.getBasePlot(false))
618                        || (plots = other.getConnectedPlots()).size() <= max && frontier.addAll(plots) && (max -= plots.size()) != -1)) {
619                    current.mergePlot(other, removeRoads, queue);
620                    merged.add(current.getId());
621                    merged.add(other.getId());
622                    toReturn = true;
623
624                    if (removeRoads) {
625                        ArrayList<PlotId> ids = new ArrayList<>();
626                        ids.add(current.getId());
627                        ids.add(other.getId());
628                        this.plot.getManager().finishPlotMerge(ids, queue);
629                    }
630                }
631            }
632        }
633        if (actor != null && Settings.QUEUE.NOTIFY_PROGRESS) {
634            queue.addProgressSubscriber(subscriberFactory.createWithActor(actor));
635        }
636        if (queue.size() > 0) {
637            queue.enqueue();
638        }
639        visited.forEach(Plot::clearCache);
640        return toReturn;
641    }
642
643    /**
644     * Moves a plot physically, as well as the corresponding settings.
645     *
646     * @param destination Plot moved to
647     * @param actor       The actor executing the task
648     * @param whenDone    task when done
649     * @param allowSwap   whether to swap plots
650     * @return {@code true} if the move was successful, else {@code false}
651     */
652    public @NonNull CompletableFuture<Boolean> move(
653            final @NonNull Plot destination,
654            final @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
655            final @NonNull Runnable whenDone,
656            final boolean allowSwap
657    ) {
658        final PlotId offset = PlotId.of(
659                destination.getId().getX() - this.plot.getId().getX(),
660                destination.getId().getY() - this.plot.getId().getY()
661        );
662        Location db = destination.getBottomAbs();
663        Location ob = this.plot.getBottomAbs();
664        final int offsetX = db.getX() - ob.getX();
665        final int offsetZ = db.getZ() - ob.getZ();
666        if (!this.plot.hasOwner()) {
667            TaskManager.runTaskLater(whenDone, TaskTime.ticks(1L));
668            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
669        }
670        AtomicBoolean occupied = new AtomicBoolean(false);
671        Set<Plot> plots = this.plot.getConnectedPlots();
672        for (Plot plot : plots) {
673            Plot other = plot.getRelative(destination.getArea(), offset.getX(), offset.getY());
674            if (other.hasOwner()) {
675                if (!allowSwap) {
676                    TaskManager.runTaskLater(whenDone, TaskTime.ticks(1L));
677                    return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
678                }
679                occupied.set(true);
680            } else {
681                plot.getPlotModificationManager().removeSign();
682            }
683        }
684        // world border
685        destination.updateWorldBorder();
686        final ArrayDeque<CuboidRegion> regions = new ArrayDeque<>(this.plot.getRegions());
687        // move / swap data
688        final PlotArea originArea = this.plot.getArea();
689
690        final Iterator<Plot> plotIterator = plots.iterator();
691
692        CompletableFuture<Boolean> future = null;
693        if (plotIterator.hasNext()) {
694            while (plotIterator.hasNext()) {
695                final Plot plot = plotIterator.next();
696                final Plot other = plot.getRelative(destination.getArea(), offset.getX(), offset.getY());
697                final CompletableFuture<Boolean> swapResult = plot.swapData(other);
698                if (future == null) {
699                    future = swapResult;
700                } else {
701                    future = future.thenCombine(swapResult, (fn, th) -> fn);
702                }
703            }
704        } else {
705            future = CompletableFuture.completedFuture(true);
706        }
707
708        return future.thenApply(result -> {
709            if (!result) {
710                return false;
711            }
712            // copy terrain
713            if (occupied.get()) {
714                new Runnable() {
715                    @Override
716                    public void run() {
717                        if (regions.isEmpty()) {
718                            // Update signs
719                            destination.getPlotModificationManager().setSign();
720                            setSign();
721                            // Run final tasks
722                            TaskManager.runTask(whenDone);
723                        } else {
724                            CuboidRegion region = regions.poll();
725                            Location[] corners = Plot.getCorners(plot.getWorldName(), region);
726                            Location pos1 = corners[0];
727                            Location pos2 = corners[1];
728                            Location pos3 = pos1.add(offsetX, 0, offsetZ).withWorld(destination.getWorldName());
729                            PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().swap(pos1, pos2, pos3, actor, this);
730                        }
731                    }
732                }.run();
733            } else {
734                new Runnable() {
735                    @Override
736                    public void run() {
737                        if (regions.isEmpty()) {
738                            Plot plot = destination.getRelative(0, 0);
739                            Plot originPlot =
740                                    originArea.getPlotAbs(PlotId.of(
741                                            plot.getId().getX() - offset.getX(),
742                                            plot.getId().getY() - offset.getY()
743                                    ));
744                            final Runnable clearDone = () -> {
745                                QueueCoordinator queue = PlotModificationManager.this.plot.getArea().getQueue();
746                                for (final Plot current : plot.getConnectedPlots()) {
747                                    PlotModificationManager.this.plot.getManager().claimPlot(current, queue);
748                                }
749                                if (queue.size() > 0) {
750                                    queue.enqueue();
751                                }
752                                plot.getPlotModificationManager().setSign();
753                                TaskManager.runTask(whenDone);
754                            };
755                            if (originPlot != null) {
756                                originPlot.getPlotModificationManager().clear(false, true, actor, clearDone);
757                            } else {
758                                clearDone.run();
759                            }
760                            return;
761                        }
762                        final Runnable task = this;
763                        CuboidRegion region = regions.poll();
764                        Location[] corners = Plot.getCorners(
765                                PlotModificationManager.this.plot.getWorldName(),
766                                region
767                        );
768                        final Location pos1 = corners[0];
769                        final Location pos2 = corners[1];
770                        Location newPos = pos1.add(offsetX, 0, offsetZ).withWorld(destination.getWorldName());
771                        PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().copyRegion(pos1, pos2, newPos, actor, task);
772                    }
773                }.run();
774            }
775            return true;
776        });
777    }
778
779    /**
780     * Unlink a plot and remove the roads
781     *
782     * @return {@code true} if plot was linked
783     * @see #unlinkPlot(boolean, boolean)
784     */
785    public boolean unlink() {
786        return this.unlinkPlot(true, true);
787    }
788
789    /**
790     * Swap the plot contents and settings with another location<br>
791     * - The destination must correspond to a valid plot of equal dimensions
792     *
793     * @param destination The other plot to swap with
794     * @param actor       The actor executing the task
795     * @param whenDone    A task to run when finished, or null
796     * @return Future that completes with {@code true} if the swap was successful, else {@code false}
797     */
798    public @NonNull CompletableFuture<Boolean> swap(
799            final @NonNull Plot destination,
800            @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
801            final @NonNull Runnable whenDone
802    ) {
803        return this.move(destination, actor, whenDone, true);
804    }
805
806    /**
807     * Moves the plot to an empty location<br>
808     * - The location must be empty
809     *
810     * @param destination Where to move the plot
811     * @param actor       The actor executing the task
812     * @param whenDone    A task to run when done, or null
813     * @return Future that completes with {@code true} if the move was successful, else {@code false}
814     */
815    public @NonNull CompletableFuture<Boolean> move(
816            final @NonNull Plot destination,
817            @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
818            final @NonNull Runnable whenDone
819    ) {
820        return this.move(destination, actor, whenDone, false);
821    }
822
823    /**
824     * Sets a component for a plot to the provided blocks<br>
825     * - E.g. floor, wall, border etc.<br>
826     * - The available components depend on the generator being used<br>
827     *
828     * @param component Component to set
829     * @param blocks    Pattern to use the generation
830     * @param actor     The actor executing the task
831     * @param queue     Nullable {@link QueueCoordinator}. If null, creates own queue and enqueues,
832     *                  otherwise writes to the queue but does not enqueue.
833     * @return {@code true} if the component was set successfully, else {@code false}
834     */
835    public boolean setComponent(
836            final @NonNull String component,
837            final @NonNull Pattern blocks,
838            @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
839            final @Nullable QueueCoordinator queue
840    ) {
841        final PlotComponentSetEvent event = PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher().callComponentSet(this.plot, component, blocks);
842        return this.plot.getManager().setComponent(this.plot.getId(), event.getComponent(), event.getPattern(), actor, queue);
843    }
844
845    /**
846     * Delete a plot (use null for the runnable if you don't need to be notified on completion)
847     *
848     * <p>
849     * Use {@link PlotModificationManager#clear(boolean, boolean, PlotPlayer, Runnable)} to simply clear a plot
850     * </p>
851     *
852     * @param actor    The actor executing the task
853     * @param whenDone task to run when plot has been deleted. Nullable
854     * @return {@code true} if the deletion was successful, {@code false} if not
855     * @see PlotSquared#removePlot(Plot, boolean)
856     */
857    public boolean deletePlot(@Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor, final Runnable whenDone) {
858        if (!this.plot.hasOwner()) {
859            return false;
860        }
861        final Set<Plot> plots = this.plot.getConnectedPlots();
862        this.clear(false, true, actor, () -> {
863            for (Plot current : plots) {
864                current.unclaim();
865            }
866            TaskManager.runTask(whenDone);
867        });
868        return true;
869    }
870
871    /**
872     * /**
873     * Sets components such as border, wall, floor.
874     * (components are generator specific)
875     *
876     * @param component component to set
877     * @param blocks    string of block(s) to set component to
878     * @param actor     The player executing the task
879     * @param queue     Nullable {@link QueueCoordinator}. If null, creates own queue and enqueues,
880     *                  otherwise writes to the queue but does not enqueue.
881     * @return {@code true} if the update was successful, {@code false} if not
882     */
883    @Deprecated
884    public boolean setComponent(
885            String component,
886            String blocks,
887            @Nullable PlotPlayer<?> actor,
888            @Nullable QueueCoordinator queue
889    ) {
890        final BlockBucket parsed = ConfigurationUtil.BLOCK_BUCKET.parseString(blocks);
891        if (parsed != null && parsed.isEmpty()) {
892            return false;
893        }
894        return this.setComponent(component, parsed.toPattern(), actor, queue);
895    }
896
897    /**
898     * Remove the south road section of a plot<br>
899     * - Used when a plot is merged<br>
900     *
901     * @param queue Nullable {@link QueueCoordinator}. If null, creates own queue and enqueues,
902     *              otherwise writes to the queue but does not enqueue.
903     */
904    public void removeRoadSouth(final @Nullable QueueCoordinator queue) {
905        if (this.plot.getArea().getType() != PlotAreaType.NORMAL && this.plot
906                .getArea()
907                .getTerrain() == PlotAreaTerrainType.ROAD) {
908            Plot other = this.plot.getRelative(Direction.SOUTH);
909            Location bot = other.getBottomAbs();
910            Location top = this.plot.getTopAbs();
911            Location pos1 = Location.at(this.plot.getWorldName(), bot.getX(), plot.getArea().getMinGenHeight(), top.getZ());
912            Location pos2 = Location.at(this.plot.getWorldName(), top.getX(), plot.getArea().getMaxGenHeight(), bot.getZ());
913            PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().regenerateRegion(pos1, pos2, true, null);
914        } else if (this.plot.getArea().getTerrain() != PlotAreaTerrainType.ALL) { // no road generated => no road to remove
915            this.plot.getManager().removeRoadSouth(this.plot, queue);
916        }
917    }
918
919    /**
920     * Remove the east road section of a plot<br>
921     * - Used when a plot is merged<br>
922     *
923     * @param queue Nullable {@link QueueCoordinator}. If null, creates own queue and enqueues,
924     *              otherwise writes to the queue but does not enqueue.
925     */
926    public void removeRoadEast(@Nullable QueueCoordinator queue) {
927        if (this.plot.getArea().getType() != PlotAreaType.NORMAL && this.plot
928                .getArea()
929                .getTerrain() == PlotAreaTerrainType.ROAD) {
930            Plot other = this.plot.getRelative(Direction.EAST);
931            Location bot = other.getBottomAbs();
932            Location top = this.plot.getTopAbs();
933            Location pos1 = Location.at(this.plot.getWorldName(), top.getX(), plot.getArea().getMinGenHeight(), bot.getZ());
934            Location pos2 = Location.at(this.plot.getWorldName(), bot.getX(), plot.getArea().getMaxGenHeight(), top.getZ());
935            PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().regenerateRegion(pos1, pos2, true, null);
936        } else if (this.plot.getArea().getTerrain() != PlotAreaTerrainType.ALL) { // no road generated => no road to remove
937            this.plot.getArea().getPlotManager().removeRoadEast(this.plot, queue);
938        }
939    }
940
941    /**
942     * Remove the SE road (only effects terrain)
943     *
944     * @param queue Nullable {@link QueueCoordinator}. If null, creates own queue and enqueues,
945     *              otherwise writes to the queue but does not enqueue.
946     */
947    public void removeRoadSouthEast(@Nullable QueueCoordinator queue) {
948        if (this.plot.getArea().getType() != PlotAreaType.NORMAL && this.plot
949                .getArea()
950                .getTerrain() == PlotAreaTerrainType.ROAD) {
951            Plot other = this.plot.getRelative(1, 1);
952            Location pos1 = this.plot.getTopAbs().add(1, 0, 1);
953            Location pos2 = other.getBottomAbs().subtract(1, 0, 1);
954            PlotSquared.platform().regionManager().regenerateRegion(pos1, pos2, true, null);
955        } else if (this.plot.getArea().getTerrain() != PlotAreaTerrainType.ALL) { // no road generated => no road to remove
956            this.plot.getArea().getPlotManager().removeRoadSouthEast(this.plot, queue);
957        }
958    }
959
960}
